name: One-Level-Only Er.: Platformer without Platform
description:
It is my second time publishing a game. Please enjoy the game and leaving a comment down would be greatly appreciated.

W for jump, AD for left right, R for re-spawn, Get to the yellow block for Win.

Corona virus is currently affecting Hong Kong seriously. Schools are suspended so we had to learn online. Everything is so tough. I could only spare ~8 hours to make this game. Public exam is coming in 2 years. However I don't want to give up making games. Please give me some supports. ToT

#HK Ga Yau

BTW all arts(using Pixilart) and music(using BeepBox) is originally made by me. ^^
